remarks: Lemma for ~ divsqrsum and ~ divsqrtsum2 .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-May-2016.)
statement:
divsqrtsum.2 $e |- F = ( x e. RR+ |-> ( sum_ n e. ( 1 ... ( |_ ` x ) ) ( 1 / ( sqrt ` n ) ) - ( 2 x. ( sqrt ` x ) ) ) ) $.
divsqrtsumlem $p |- ( F : RR+ --> RR /\ F e. dom ~~>r /\ ( ( F ~~>r L /\ A e. RR+ ) -> ( abs ` ( ( F ` A ) - L ) ) <_ ( 1 / ( sqrt ` A ) ) ) ) $.
$d A n x $.
$d n x $.
